initial_user_prompt: Can you help me with a payment as my user is 2025 and I have to pay an amount of 520dt and I am using PayPal?
modified_prompt: Can you help me with a payment as my user is 2025 and I have to pay an amount of 520dt and I am using PayPal?

expected_result.llm_response: Your payment of 520dt using PayPal has been successfully processed. Your transaction ID is TXN-2025-655117.

initial_user_prompt: Can you help me schedule a payment as my user is 2025 and I have to pay an amount of 520dt by 2025-09-20?
modified_prompt: Can you help me schedule a payment as my user is 2025 and I have to pay an amount of 520dt by 2025-09-20?

expected_result.llm_response: The payment of 520dt has been successfully scheduled for the 20th of September, 2025. Your schedule ID is SCH-2025-539393. Please keep this ID for future reference regarding this transaction.
